page.title: 06My View of Millbrook Estate
page.content: The estate was very dull, the houses were grey stonework which didn't brighten the houses up. They had a youth club nearby which looked very good. They had two schools which were near the houses so children didn't have a long walk. The council houses were built in the 1960s & early 1970s & they were beginning to crack in places alredy so they don't last long. The people living there seemed quite friendly. There were a lot of parks nearby. There also seemed to be a lot of waste ground but they will probably do something with it later. There were a lot of old people's homes which looked very smart and tidy.
